contest-event.event-date:
July 29, 1922 D Huddersfield Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA September Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA September Contest huddersfield-district-bba-contest-section-a
None
Greenhead Park, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK 1st annual contest promoted by Huddersfield & District BBA. Bands not in the prize list were then allowed to compete in Section B. - Brighouse declined to accept. (British Bandsman 5/8/1922) 8 bands competed.
Aug. 31, 2013, 6:50 a.m. Jan. 18, 2021, 3:09 p.m.
1 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Noel Thorpe
2 Slaithwaite Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
3 Hinchliffe Mill Band A. Clough
4 Hepworth Band Harold Kemp
Unknown Result Brighouse and Rastrick Band Willie Wood
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band Harold Kemp
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band Sydney Wood
Unknown Result Meltham and Meltham Mills Band V. Kaye
